explains: v. 克制；阻挡（withhold 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: withholding agent 预扣税款代理人
withholding tax （美）代扣所得税（指企事业雇主代替政府从雇员薪金中扣除的所得税）

sentences.en: She was accused of withholding information from the police.
sentences.cn: 她被指控对警方知情不报。

sentences.en: One of the accused got off lightly in exchange for pleading guilty to withholding information from Congress.
sentences.cn: 其中一名被告获得了从轻发落，因其承认了未向国会提供情报的罪行。
